001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriber;
005import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint;
006import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberConfiguration;
007import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberErrorLog;
008import com.exoreaction.xorcery.process.Process;
009import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ClientConfiguration;
010import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ReactiveStreamsClient;
011import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
012
013import java.io.IOException;
014import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
015import java.net.URI;
016import java.util.concurrent.CancellationException;
017import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
018
019public record PersistentSubscriberProcess(
020        PersistentSubscriberConfiguration configuration,
021        ReactiveStreamsClient reactiveStreamsClient,
022        PersistentSubscriber persistentSubscriber,
023        PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint persistentSubscriberCheckpoint,
024        PersistentSubscriberErrorLog persistentSubscriberErrorLog,
025        Logger logger,
026        CompletableFuture<Void> result)
027        implements Process<Void> {
028
029    @Override
030    public void start() {
031        URI eventsUri = configuration.getURI();
032        String stream = configuration().getStream();
033
034        logger.info("Starting persistent subscriber for {}#{}", eventsUri, stream);
035
036        PersistentSubscriberSubscriber subscriber = new PersistentSubscriberSubscriber(
037                this,
038                configuration,
039                persistentSubscriber,
040                persistentSubscriberCheckpoint,
041                persistentSubscriberErrorLog,
042                logger);
043
044        CompletableFuture<Void> subscribeFuture = reactiveStreamsClient.subscribe(eventsUri,
045                        stream,
046                        this::publisherStreamConfiguration,
047                        subscriber,
048                        subscriber.getClass(),
049                        ClientConfiguration.defaults())
050                .whenComplete(this::complete);
051
052        result.whenComplete((r, t) ->
053        {
054            subscribeFuture.cancel(false);
055        });
056    }
057
058    private Configuration publisherStreamConfiguration() {
059
060        try {
061            Configuration.Builder builder = configuration.getConfiguration().asBuilder();
062            long revision = persistentSubscriberCheckpoint.getCheckpoint();
063            builder.add("revision", revision);
064            return builder.build();
065        } catch (IOException e) {
066            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
067        }
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public boolean isRetryable(Throwable t) {
072        if (t instanceof CancellationException)
073            return false;
074
075        logger.warn("Event processing error, retrying", t);
076
077        return true;
078    }
079
080    @Override
081    public void stop() {
082        try {
083            persistentSubscriberCheckpoint.close();
084            persistentSubscriberErrorLog.close();
085        } catch (IOException e) {
086            logger.error("Could not stop subscriber process", e);
087        }
088
089        Process.super.stop();
090    }
091}
